title: Amazon India Seller Opportunity Finder - Full-Stack Product Research Platform

requirements.text: Create backend data model for storing Amazon.in product information including: product title, category, subcategory, price, MRP, rating, number of reviews, BSR (Best Seller Rank), seller type (FBA/Easy Ship/Seller Fulfilled), brand, estimated monthly sales, and stock availability

quotes: Extract: Product title, Category & subcategory, Price, MRP, Rating, Number of reviews, BSR (Best Seller Rank), Seller type (FBA / Easy Ship / Seller Fulfilled), Brand, Estimated monthly sales (calculate via BSR model), Stock availability

acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores complete product records with all specified fields
Data model supports BSR ranking and sales estimation
Seller type is categorized as FBA, Easy Ship, or Seller Fulfilled

requirements.text: Implement proprietary Opportunity Score algorithm (1-100 scale) calculated as: (Demand Score × Growth Score × Margin Potential) ÷ Competition Score, where Demand Score is based on BSR, review velocity, and sales estimate; Competition Score considers number of sellers, average reviews, brand dominance, and sponsored listing density; Growth Score tracks trending keywords, recent review spikes, and price growth; Margin Potential calculates selling price minus Amazon fees and estimated sourcing cost

quotes: Create a proprietary 'Opportunity Score' based on: Opportunity Score = (High Demand Score × Growth Score × Margin Potential) ÷ Competition Score

acceptanceCriteria: Algorithm calculates score from 1 to 100 for each product
Score incorporates all four factors: demand, competition, growth, and margin
Score updates when underlying data changes

requirements.text: Support all Amazon.in product categories including: Electronics, Home & Kitchen, Beauty, Grocery, Fashion, Automotive, Industrial, Toys, Baby, Health, Books, Pet Supplies, Office, Sports, Handmade, Luxury, and emerging categories with category filter and subcategory drill-down navigation

quotes: Must include: Electronics, Home & Kitchen, Beauty, Grocery, Fashion, Automotive, Industrial, Toys, Baby, Health, Books, Pet Supplies, Office, Sports, Handmade, Luxury, Emerging categories

acceptanceCriteria: All listed categories are available for filtering
Users can drill down into subcategories
Category hierarchy is navigable in the UI

requirements.text: Create advanced filtering system allowing users to filter by: price range (₹), rating threshold (< 4 stars), review count (< 200), BSR range, monthly revenue range, product weight (with lightweight preference), non-branded/private label friendly flag, low FBA seller count, high review growth in last 30 days, and high margin threshold (>30%)

quotes: Price range (₹), Rating < 4 stars, Reviews < 200, BSR range, Monthly revenue range, Weight (lightweight preferred), Non-branded / private label friendly, Low FBA seller count, High review growth last 30 days, High margin (>30%)

acceptanceCriteria: All specified filters are functional and combinable
Filters update product results in real-time
Filter state persists during user session

requirements.text: Build keyword research module displaying: search volume estimate, keyword difficulty score, CPC (cost-per-click) estimate, 12-month trend graph, long-tail keyword suggestions, and auto-suggest functionality derived from Amazon search patterns

quotes: Show search volume estimate, Keyword difficulty, CPC estimate, Trend graph (last 12 months), Long-tail keyword suggestions, Auto-suggest scraping from Amazon search bar

acceptanceCriteria: Keyword tool shows all specified metrics
Trend graph displays 12 months of data
Auto-suggest provides relevant long-tail keyword variations

requirements.text: Implement trend detection system that identifies: products with sudden review growth spikes, price increase trends, seasonal demand patterns, and automatically assigns 'Rising Star' badge to qualifying products

quotes: Detect products with sudden review growth, Detect price increase trend, Identify seasonal spikes, Show 'Rising Star' badge

acceptanceCriteria: System detects review velocity changes
Price trend analysis identifies upward movements
Rising Star badge appears on qualifying products
Seasonal patterns are tracked and displayed

requirements.text: Create India-specific profit calculator that computes: Amazon referral fees, FBA fees, GST consideration, shipping cost, packaging cost, and ads budget; outputs net profit per unit, ROI percentage, and break-even ACOS (Advertising Cost of Sale)

quotes: Include: Amazon referral fees, FBA fees, GST consideration, Shipping cost, Packaging cost, Ads budget
Output: Net profit per unit, ROI %, Break-even ACOS

acceptanceCriteria: Calculator includes all India-specific cost factors
Outputs display net profit, ROI percentage, and break-even ACOS
GST calculations are accurate for Indian tax structure

requirements.text: Build competitor analysis page that displays top 10 sellers for a selected product showing: average price, average rating, average reviews, listing quality score, and weakness detection (poor images, bad keywords, low review count, high price)

quotes: Show: Top 10 sellers, Avg price, Avg rating, Avg reviews, Listing quality score
Weakness detection: Poor images? Bad keywords? Low review count? High price?

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking a product opens competitor analysis view
Top 10 sellers are ranked and displayed with all metrics
Weakness detection identifies specific competitive gaps

requirements.text: Design modern dashboard UI with dark mode support featuring: category heatmap visualization, opportunity leaderboard, sortable product lists (by highest score, highest revenue, lowest competition, highest growth), and interactive charts including revenue bar charts, BSR trend lines, review growth graphs, and margin breakdown visualizations

quotes: Modern dashboard: Dark mode, Category heatmap, Opportunity leaderboard, Sort by: Highest score, Highest revenue, Lowest competition, Highest growth
Use charts: Revenue bar charts, BSR trends, Review growth graph, Margin breakdown

acceptanceCriteria: Dark mode toggle is functional throughout the application
Category heatmap visualizes opportunity distribution
All specified chart types render with accurate data
Users can sort by all specified criteria

requirements.text: Implement seller alerts notification system that triggers alerts for: new high-opportunity products discovered, sudden drops in competition levels, trending keyword emergence, and seasonal demand spikes

quotes: New high-opportunity product alert, Sudden drop in competition, Trending keyword alert, Seasonal spike alert

acceptanceCriteria: Alert system monitors all four trigger conditions
Notifications are displayed in the UI
Users can view alert history

requirements.text: Create monetization tier system with Free plan (limited searches per day), Pro plan, and Premium plan; include features for data export to CSV, saved product lists, and email alert delivery for paid tiers

quotes: Free plan (limited searches/day), Pro plan, Premium plan, Data export (CSV), Saved product list, Email alerts

acceptanceCriteria: Three distinct plan tiers are implemented
Free tier enforces daily search limits
CSV export is available for paid users
Users can save and manage product lists

requirements.text: Add bonus advanced features including: AI-generated suggestion explaining why each product is a good opportunity, private label suitability score, brand domination detection, market saturation warnings, estimated capital required calculation, and India sourcing suggestions with local manufacturer hints

quotes: AI suggestion: 'Why this product is good opportunity', Private label suitability score, Brand domination detection, Saturation warning, Capital required estimation, India sourcing suggestion (local manufacturer hint)

acceptanceCriteria: Each product displays AI-generated opportunity explanation
Private label score indicates manufacturing feasibility
Brand domination and saturation warnings appear when relevant
Capital requirements are estimated and displayed

requirements.text: Design product display card format showing: Product Name, Category, Price, Estimated Sales, Revenue, Competition Level, Opportunity Score (1-100), Net Margin, Trend Status, and Recommendation indicator (YES/AVOID/MODERATE)

quotes: Display: Product Name, Category, Price, Estimated Sales, Revenue, Competition Level, Opportunity Score, Net Margin, Trend Status, Recommendation: YES / AVOID / MODERATE

acceptanceCriteria: Product cards display all specified information fields
Recommendation indicator uses clear visual distinction
Cards are scannable and organized in a grid or list layout

requirements.text: Optimize application for Indian seller needs by handling GST pricing structure, considering Indian buying behavior patterns in algorithms, ensuring scalability for millions of product records, and maintaining search response time under 3 seconds

quotes: Tool must be optimized for Indian sellers. Must handle GST pricing. Must consider Indian buying behaviour. Must be scalable for millions of products. Must be fast (<3 sec search response)

acceptanceCriteria: GST calculations are integrated throughout pricing logic
Search and filter operations complete in under 3 seconds
Backend architecture supports millions of product records
Algorithms account for India-specific market patterns

constraints: Must use React with TypeScript for frontend
Must use Motoko for backend (no Node.js or Python)
Must use single-actor architecture for Motoko backend
Must optimize for performance with <3 second search response time
Must handle millions of product records efficiently
Cannot integrate external databases (PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis)
Cannot implement real-time features like WebSockets
Cannot integrate external APIs directly (Amazon API, scraping services)
Cannot send email alerts via external services (SendGrid, Mailgun)
nonGoals: Integration with actual Amazon.in API or web scraping
Real-time data fetching from Amazon servers
Integration with external payment processors for monetization
Backend services in Rust, Python, or Node.js
Automated captcha handling or proxy rotation
Real-time WebSocket connections for live data updates
